subject: I placed an order for pedals but didnt receive an email on anything
description_text:
Hey guys I placed an order about half hour ago for Plus X pedals P3-H3 in
black, to address 102 Greenwood St. P.O. Box 360 Marystown NL Canada A0E
1K0. With a royal bank credit card name DARLENE BENNETT and entered the
email shanebennettdoterra@gmail.com for my updates but I havent recieved
anything at all in regards to my order... can you guys please send me the
correct information I need like my receipt, tracking number and other
details please

Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Shane Bennett,  Please provide the order date and amount so I can help you check the order. Also, could you confirm whether you entered an email address when placing the order?

we did enter an email, the email we entered was this one but I think we may
have entered it after the order was processed and the email didn’t go
through with the order, we had some trouble entering the shipping address
and when we re-entered the information I think the email may have been
missing from the form didn’t go through, the order was placed October 8th,
for a total of 243.90 USD before shipping and with shipping a grand total
of 234.29 USD with an order confirmation number of #ssn2886, and a phone
number attached of (709) 567-9433…. Can you please send the receipt and the
tracking number for the order please

On Thu, Oct 9, 2025 at 5:25 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Shane Bennett,  As October 1st to 8th was the National Day holiday, we will ship your order today and provide you with the tracking number once it has been dispatched.

Hi Shane Bennett,    We sincerely apologize for the delay in shipping your order. We have just concluded our 8-day holiday. We encountered an issue while attempting to ship via UPS, as UPS does not support delivery to P.O. Box addresses. Could you please provide us with your residential address?

I’m in Canada isn’t UPS United States postal service??? I also put my
residential address on the address also here it is again…. Maybe there was
an issue with me entering the town I live in and not the exact part of town
cause a lot of our mail comes labeled as Creston and not Marystown from
some reason….
The postal code just to make sure u don’t make an error I have had happen
to me from private mail is zeros not O’s so a0e 1k0
 I just grabbed an old package box I got from courier and the address on it
is as follows

Shane Bennett
102 Greenwood St.
Creston, NL
CANADA
A0E 1K0

Let’s get these pedals posted cause I have heard great things about them!!!
Thanks guys!

Shane





On Fri, Oct 10, 2025 at 1:22 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Shane Bennett,    Thank you for your prompt confirmation. Here is your logistics tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=1ZJ455510427234307
